name: crawl
tagline: R package for modeling animal movement with continuous-time correlated random walk models
body:
### Welcome to crawl.
This is the new home for the `crawl` R package. The release version is on CRAN. The development version is located on github and can be installed with the `devtools` package via
```
library(devtools)
install_github("crawl", username="NMML")
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
